name: Neelsmith.github.io
body:
## GitHub Pages ##

For the past few years, I've been using mercurial for DVC, but I'm beginning to get my feet wet with git in order to take advantage of some of github's attractive features.

Most of my active coding is in groovy, and remains for now in [my 80+ repositories on bitbucket][bb], but I've begun hosting the scholarly editing projects I collaborate on with members of the [Holy Cross Manuscripts, Inscriptions and Documents Club][mid] (HCMID) here on github.  

- Here are [HCMID projects on github][midgit].)
- Here I am [at Holy Cross][hc].

[midgit]: http://neelsmith.github.io/hcmid-edd/

[mid]:  http://shot.holycross.edu/hcmid/

[bb]: https://bitbucket.org/neelsmith/

[hc]:  http://shot.holycross.edu/~nsmith
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
